name: Teh C
description: Teh-C is hot tea with evaporated milk. “Teh” is the local word for tea, while “C” refers to the evaporated milk added to the beverage. This is a tea originating from and popular in Singapore and Malaysia.
directions: Place tea bag into a cup and pour hot water until the cup is 3/4 full. Let the tea seep for 5 minutes
Add in the evaporated milk and sugar. Stir well
